testsuite.name: FileServerTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #4
Can't find a file after getting it from the server by name. Looks like your server lose all stored files after restart. You should store all downloaded files from the server in /client/data/ folder.
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - save a file, 3 - delete a file): > 1 Do you want to get the file by name or by id (1 - name, 2 - id): > 1 Enter name: > test_purpose_newFile.txt The response says that this file is not found!
